channel.title: Champagne on Simba Tango
channel.description: Recent content in Champagne on Simba Tango

item.title: Champagne tango
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: byÂ Simba tango The Argentines have this thing about champagne. Not usually the real thing, but their own version. Which is actually quite good, and of course much cheaper. Going shopping in our closest super market makes this very clear, they have coolers, a fridge with pre cooled ‘champan’ (as they like to call it), rows and rows of different brands and special promotions: Buy this and that and get half a bottle for free!

item.title: White powder vs. Tango Argentino
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: Powder Mountain Perspective from Ian Provo on Vimeo. Common (could be pro or con, depending…): Balance Rhythm Dissociation Improvisation Flow Max 12 min. rush Addictive Skiing pros Fresh air Beautiful mountains Keeps you in shape Skiing cons Avalanches Weather dependent Cold, dress accordingly Tough ascents Heavy on the knees Practical clothing
